creator: dat&
descriptionHtml:
This app is for play Ingress Prime more comfortably.
And this app specialized in glyph hack.
Recommended for you who are not good at glyph hack.
Of course, recommended for you who are good at glyph hack!
Because this app has more functions to play glyph hack more comfortably.

Glyph sequence is a message from Ingress.
If you understand glyph more deeply, you may reach the truth of Ingress.

My favorite sequence is it.
BEFORE - MYSTERY - AFTER - KNOWLEDGE

This app is a free version that display ads.
Please try a paid version with no ads(GlyphHackerOnyx) if you are interested.

follow me(twitter) : @CreateDatMore

Release [05.17.2020]
[About new function]
glyph challenge function
(1)Transit to MODS screen by tapping MODS.
(2)There is a new button "CHALLENGE" at the bottom left of the screen.
(3)Transit to Glyph challenge screen by tapping "CHALLENGE" button.
(4)You can check glyph and challenge glyph questions(5questions in 1 set) on the Glyph challenge screen!
(5)It helps to understand glyph!
※Full screen ads are displayed with a certain probability when the glyph check screen is displayed or the trace mode ends.
However, if you try the glyph questions, the ads display probability will change from 10% to 90% according to the correct answer rate.
Default rate is 50%.
And it changes by 10% every day and becomes 50% if you do nothing.

Release [01.10.2020]
[About new function]YouTube : https://youtu.be/w4ZyyqC4I-A
passcode register, display, share function
　(1)Transit to the passcode display screen by long tapping the timer button.
　　Display the registered unused passcodes on the screen.
　　・transit to the main screen by tapping the "×" button.
　　・display the registered passcodes in order by tapping the "↓" or "↑" button.
　　・the displayed passcode is maked used state by tapping the "used" button.
　　・the displayed passcode is maked invalid state by long tapping the "used" button.
　　・able to copy passcode by long tapping the passcode display area.
　(2)Transit to the passcode registration screen by tapping the "Register" button on setting screen,
or long tapping the "↓" button on passcode display screen.
　　Passcode can be registered on the screen.
　(3)Transit to the passcode list screen by tapping the "List" button on the passcode registration screen.
　　Able to manage registered passcodes on the screen.
　　・change passcode state(unused,used,invalid)
　　・delete passcode
　　・lock passcode(Only when unused)
　　　※Locked passcodes are excluded from the following operations.
　　　　・status change by list operation
　　　　・share passcodes
　(4)Transit to the communication screen by tapping the "Share" button on the passcode registration screen.
　　List of nearby devices by tapping "Search" button on the screen.
　(5)Transit to the passcodes sharing screen to by tapping the device you want to connect to from the list and
"Connect" button.
　　You can send the passcodes of the displayed lsit to the connection partner by tapping the "Send" button on the screen.
※When sharing passcodes, you must the "Yes" button at passcode sharing on the setting screen and allow location.
descriptionShort: This app supports you to enjoy glyph hack in Ingress Prime.

・Added a new function "glyph challenge".
(You can check all glyph and challenge glyph questions.)

[Improvement]

Release [11.12.2020]

[About new function]
glyph learning function
>On trace mode if you let the function learn traced glyph, the function will be able to infer glyph sequence.
(1)Please enable the glyph learning function on the setting screen.
(2)On trace mode if you tap end button on the trace result screen, the glyph learning screen is displayed.
(3)If the infer is wrong or unpredictable, tap the infer area to set the correct answer.
(4)A sequence list is created by entering the correct answer and learning it.
(5)The sequence list can be transitioned from the glyph learning function item on the setting screen or from the glyph challenge screen.
(6)The function will be able to infer sequences from fragmentary glyphs by repeated learning.
(7)If inferable, tap the first glyph to switch between trace result and infer on trace result screen.

creator: dat&
descriptionHtml:
This app is for play Ingress Prime more comfortably.
And this app specialized in glyph hack.
Recommended for you who are not good at glyph hack.
Of course, recommended for you who are good at glyph hack!
Because this app has more functions to play glyph hack more comfortably.

Glyph sequence is a message from Ingress.
If you understand glyph more deeply, you may reach the truth of Ingress.

My favorite sequence is it.
BEFORE - MYSTERY - AFTER - KNOWLEDGE

This app is a free version that display ads.
Please try a paid version with no ads(GlyphHackerOnyx) if you are interested.

follow me(twitter) : @CreateDatMore

Release [11.12.2020]
YouTube : https://youtu.be/DJeVcYJrKEw
[About new function]
glyph learning function
>On trace mode if you let the function learn traced glyph, the function will be able to infer glyph sequence.
(1)Please enable the glyph learning function on the setting screen.
(2)On trace mode if you tap end button on the trace result screen, the glyph learning screen is displayed.
(3)If the infer is wrong or unpredictable, tap the infer area to set the correct answer.
(4)A sequence list is created by entering the correct answer and learning it.
(5)The sequence list can be transitioned from the glyph learning function item on the setting screen or from the glyph challenge screen.
(6)The function will be able to infer sequences from fragmentary glyphs by repeated learning.
(7)If inferable, tap the first glyph to switch between trace result and infer on trace result screen.

Release [05.17.2020]
[About new function]
glyph challenge function
(1)Transit to MODS screen by tapping MODS.
(2)There is a new button "CHALLENGE" at the bottom left of the screen.
(3)Transit to Glyph challenge screen by tapping "CHALLENGE" button.
(4)You can check glyph and challenge glyph questions(5questions in 1 set) on the Glyph challenge screen!
(5)It helps to understand glyph!
※Full screen ads are displayed with a certain probability when the glyph check screen is displayed or the trace mode ends.
However, if you try the glyph questions, the ads display probability will change from 10% to 90% according to the correct answer rate.
Default rate is 50%.
And it changes by 10% every day and becomes 50% if you do nothing.

Release [01.10.2020]
[About new function]YouTube : https://youtu.be/w4ZyyqC4I-A
passcode register, display, share function
　(1)Transit to the passcode display screen by long tapping the timer button.
　　Display the registered unused passcodes on the screen.
　　・transit to the main screen by tapping the "×" button.
　　・display the registered passcodes in order by tapping the "↓" or "↑" button.
　　・the displayed passcode is maked used state by tapping the "used" button.
　　・the displayed passcode is maked invalid state by long tapping the "used" button.
　　・able to copy passcode by long tapping the passcode display area.
　(2)Transit to the passcode registration screen by tapping the "Register" button on setting screen,
or long tapping the "↓" button on passcode display screen.
　　Passcode can be registered on the screen.
　(3)Transit to the passcode list screen by tapping the "List" button on the passcode registration screen.
　　Able to manage registered passcodes on the screen.
　　・change passcode state(unused,used,invalid)
　　・delete passcode
　　・lock passcode(Only when unused)
　　　※Locked passcodes are excluded from the following operations.
　　　　・status change by list operation
　　　　・share passcodes
　(4)Transit to the communication screen by tapping the "Share" button on the passcode registration screen.
　　List of nearby devices by tapping "Search" button on the screen.
　(5)Transit to the passcodes sharing screen to by tapping the device you want to connect to from the list and
"Connect" button.
　　You can send the passcodes of the displayed lsit to the connection partner by tapping the "Send" button on the screen.
※When sharing passcodes, you must the "Yes" button at passcode sharing on the setting screen and allow location.
descriptionShort: This app supports you to enjoy glyph hack in Ingress Prime.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
[New function]
・Added a new function "Glyph sequence sharing".
(Tap "Share" button on the sequence list screen.)
To enable this function, change it from the setting screen.

[Improved]
・Changed some of display.

title: GlyphHacker

creator: dat&
descriptionHtml:
This app is for play Ingress more comfortably.
This app has many functions!
For example, count down function for cooldown after hack.
passcodes manage function.
glyph challenge function.
and so on...
And this app supports glyph hack more powerful.
Recommended for you who are not good at glyph hack.
Of course, recommended for you who are good at glyph hack!

Glyph sequence is a message from Ingress.
If you understand glyph more deeply, you may reach the truth of Ingress.

My favorite sequence is it.
BEFORE - MYSTERY - AFTER - KNOWLEDGE

This app is a free version that display ads.
Please try a paid version with no ads(GlyphHackerOnyx) if you are interested.

Thank you!
Follow me on twitter.
@CreateDatMore

Make sure you check out my youtube channel!
★passcode register, display, share function
https://youtu.be/w4ZyyqC4I-A
★About glyph learning function
https://youtu.be/DJeVcYJrKEw

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
[About a passcode register, display, share function]
　(1)Transit to the passcode display screen by long tapping the timer button.
　　Display the registered unused passcodes on the screen.
　　・transit to the main screen by tapping the "×" button.
　　・display the registered passcodes in order by tapping the "↓" or "↑" button.
　　・the displayed passcode is maked used state by tapping the "used" button.
　　・the displayed passcode is maked invalid state by long tapping the "used" button.
　　・able to copy passcode by long tapping the passcode display area.
　(2)Transit to the passcode registration screen by tapping the "Register" button on setting screen,
or long tapping the "↓" button on passcode display screen.
　　Passcode can be registered on the screen.
　(3)Transit to the passcode list screen by tapping the "List" button on the passcode registration screen.
　　Able to manage registered passcodes on the screen.
　　・change passcode state(unused,used,invalid)
　　・delete passcode
　　・lock passcode(Only when unused)
　　　※Locked passcodes are excluded from the following operations.
　　　　・status change by list operation
　　　　・share passcodes
　(4)Transit to the communication screen by tapping the "Share" button on the passcode registration screen.
　　List of nearby devices by tapping "Search" button on the screen.
　(5)Transit to the passcodes sharing screen to by tapping the device you want to connect to from the list and
"Connect" button.
　　You can send the passcodes of the displayed lsit to the connection partner by tapping the "Send" button on the screen.

[About a glyph challenge function]
(1)Transit to MODS screen by tapping MODS.
(2)There is a new button "CHALLENGE" at the bottom left of the screen.
(3)Transit to Glyph challenge screen by tapping "CHALLENGE" button.
(4)You can check glyph and challenge glyph questions(5questions in 1 set) on the Glyph challenge screen!
(5)It helps to understand glyph!
※Full screen ads are displayed with a certain probability when the glyph check screen is displayed or the trace mode ends.
However, if you try the glyph questions, the ads display probability will change from 10% to 90% according to the correct answer rate.

[About a glyph learning function]
On trace mode if you let the function learn traced glyph, the function will be able to infer glyph sequence.
(1)Please enable the glyph learning function on the setting screen.
(2)On trace mode if you tap end button on the trace result screen, the glyph learning screen is displayed.
(3)If the infer is wrong or unpredictable, tap the infer area to set the correct answer.
(4)A sequence list is created by entering the correct answer and learning it.
(5)The sequence list can be transitioned from the glyph learning function item on the setting screen or from the glyph challenge screen.
(6)The function will be able to infer sequences from fragmentary glyphs by repeated learning.
(7)If inferable, tap the first glyph to switch between trace result and infer on trace result screen.
descriptionShort: This app is a gadget for ingress. It supports you to play Ingress comfortably.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: ・Improved startup processing.

Please try a paid version with no ads(GlyphHackerOnyx) if you are interested.

Thank you!
Follow me on twitter.
@CreateDatMore

Make sure you check out my youtube channel!
★passcode register, display, share function
https://youtu.be/w4ZyyqC4I-A
★About glyph learning function
https://youtu.be/DJeVcYJrKEw

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
[About a passcode register, display, share function]
　(1)Transit to the passcode display screen by long tapping the timer button.
　　Display the registered unused passcodes on the screen.
　　・transit to the main screen by tapping the "×" button.
　　・display the registered passcodes in order by tapping the "↓" or "↑" button.
　　・the displayed passcode is maked used state by tapping the "used" button.
　　・the displayed passcode is maked invalid state by long tapping the "used" button.
　　・able to copy passcode by long tapping the passcode display area.
　(2)Transit to the passcode registration screen by tapping the "Register" button on setting screen,
or long tapping the "↓" button on passcode display screen.
　　Passcode can be registered on the screen.
　(3)Transit to the passcode list screen by tapping the "List" button on the passcode registration screen.
　　Able to manage registered passcodes on the screen.
　　・change passcode state(unused,used,invalid)
　　・delete passcode
　　・lock passcode(Only when unused)
　　　※Locked passcodes are excluded from the following operations.
　　　　・status change by list operation
　　　　・share passcodes
　(4)Transit to the communication screen by tapping the "Share" button on the passcode registration screen.
　　List of nearby devices by tapping "Search" button on the screen.
　(5)Transit to the passcodes sharing screen to by tapping the device you want to connect to from the list and
"Connect" button.
　　You can send the passcodes of the displayed lsit to the connection partner by tapping the "Send" button on the screen.

[About a glyph challenge function]
(1)Transit to MODS screen by tapping MODS.
(2)There is a new button "CHALLENGE" at the bottom left of the screen.
(3)Transit to Glyph challenge screen by tapping "CHALLENGE" button.
(4)You can check glyph and challenge glyph questions(5questions in 1 set) on the Glyph challenge screen!
(5)It helps to understand glyph!
※Full screen ads are displayed with a certain probability when the glyph check screen is displayed or the trace mode ends.
However, if you try the glyph questions, the ads display probability will change from 10% to 90% according to the correct answer rate.

[About a glyph learning function]
On trace mode if you let the function learn traced glyph, the function will be able to infer glyph sequence.
(1)Please enable the glyph learning function on the setting screen.
(2)On trace mode if you tap end button on the trace result screen, the glyph learning screen is displayed.
(3)If the infer is wrong or unpredictable, tap the infer area to set the correct answer.
(4)A sequence list is created by entering the correct answer and learning it.
(5)The sequence list can be transitioned from the glyph learning function item on the setting screen or from the glyph challenge screen.
(6)The function will be able to infer sequences from fragmentary glyphs by repeated learning.
(7)If inferable, tap the first glyph to switch between trace result and infer on trace result screen.

　　Display the registered unused passcodes on the screen.
　　・transit to the main screen by tapping the "×" button.
　　・display the registered passcodes in order by tapping the "↓" or "↑" button.
　　・the displayed passcode is maked used state by tapping the "used" button.
　　・the displayed passcode is maked invalid state by long tapping the "used" button.
　　・able to copy passcode by long tapping the passcode display area.
　(2)Transit to the passcode registration screen by tapping the "Register" button on setting screen,
or long tapping the "↓" button on passcode display screen.
　　Passcode can be registered on the screen.
　(3)Transit to the passcode list screen by tapping the "List" button on the passcode registration screen.
　　Able to manage registered passcodes on the screen.
　　・change passcode state(unused,used,invalid)
　　・delete passcode
　　・lock passcode(Only when unused)
　　　※Locked passcodes are excluded from the following operations.
　　　　・status change by list operation
　　　　・share passcodes
　(4)Transit to the communication screen by tapping the "Share" button on the passcode registration screen.
　　List of nearby devices by tapping "Search" button on the screen.
　(5)Transit to the passcodes sharing screen to by tapping the device you want to connect to from the list and
"Connect" button.
　　You can send the passcodes of the displayed lsit to the connection partner by tapping the "Send" button on the screen.

[About a glyph challenge function]
(1)Transit to MODS screen by tapping MODS.
(2)There is a new button "CHALLENGE" at the bottom left of the screen.
(3)Transit to Glyph challenge screen by tapping "CHALLENGE" button.
(4)You can check glyph and challenge glyph questions(5questions in 1 set) on the Glyph challenge screen!
(5)It helps to understand glyph!
※Full screen ads are displayed with a certain probability when the glyph check screen is displayed or the trace mode ends.
However, if you try the glyph questions, the ads display probability will change from 10% to 90% according to the correct answer rate.

[About a glyph learning function]
On trace mode if you let the function learn traced glyph, the function will be able to infer glyph sequence.
(1)Please enable the glyph learning function on the setting screen.
(2)On trace mode if you tap end button on the trace result screen, the glyph learning screen is displayed.
(3)If the infer is wrong or unpredictable, tap the infer area to set the correct answer.
(4)A sequence list is created by entering the correct answer and learning it.
(5)The sequence list can be transitioned from the glyph learning function item on the setting screen or from the glyph challenge screen.
(6)The function will be able to infer sequences from fragmentary glyphs by repeated learning.
(7)If inferable, tap the first glyph to switch between trace result and infer on trace result screen.
descriptionShort: This app is a gadget for ingress. It supports you to play Ingress comfortably.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
【New function】
・Added the burnout time notification function.
This function will notify you that more than 4 hours have passed since the burnout occured.
・Added the placement setting.
If the app is placed on the left or right, it can be minimized.
After minimizing, if it's placed on the left, tap the left edge and it can be maximized.
【Improved】
・Improved so that you can move by tapping the bottom.
・Improved screen transition internal processing.
・Fixed the some issues.

(4)You can check glyph and challenge glyph questions(5questions in 1 set) on the Glyph challenge screen!
(5)It helps to understand glyph!
※Full screen ads are displayed with a certain probability when the glyph check screen is displayed or the trace mode ends.
However, if you try the glyph questions, the ads display probability will change from 10% to 90% according to the correct answer rate.

[About a glyph learning function]
On trace mode if you let the function learn traced glyph, the function will be able to infer glyph sequence.
(1)Please enable the glyph learning function on the setting screen.
(2)On trace mode if you tap end button on the trace result screen, the glyph learning screen is displayed.
(3)If the infer is wrong or unpredictable, tap the infer area to set the correct answer.
(4)A sequence list is created by entering the correct answer and learning it.
(5)The sequence list can be transitioned from the glyph learning function item on the setting screen or from the glyph challenge screen.
(6)The function will be able to infer sequences from fragmentary glyphs by repeated learning.
(7)If inferable, tap the first glyph to switch between trace result and infer on trace result screen.

descriptionHtml:
This app is for play Ingress more comfortably.
This app has many functions!
For example, count down function for cooldown after hack.
passcodes manage function.
glyph challenge function.
and so on...
And this app supports glyph hack more powerful.
Recommended for you who are not good at glyph hack.
Of course, recommended for you who are good at glyph hack!

Glyph sequence is a message from Ingress.
If you understand glyph more deeply, you may reach the truth of Ingress.

My favorite sequence is it.
BEFORE - MYSTERY - AFTER - KNOWLEDGE

This app is a free version that display ads.
Please try a paid version with no ads(GlyphHackerOnyx) if you are interested.

Thank you!
Follow me on twitter.
@CreateDatMore

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
[About a passcode register, display, share function]
　(1)Transit to the passcode display screen by long tapping the timer button.
　　Display the registered unused passcodes on the screen.
　　・transit to the main screen by tapping the "×" button.
　　・display the registered passcodes in order by tapping the "↓" or "↑" button.
　　・the displayed passcode is maked used state by tapping the "used" button.
　　・the displayed passcode is maked invalid state by long tapping the "used" button.
　　・able to copy passcode by long tapping the passcode display area.
　(2)Transit to the passcode registration screen by tapping the "Register" button on setting screen,
or long tapping the "↓" button on passcode display screen.
　　Passcode can be registered on the screen.
　(3)Transit to the passcode list screen by tapping the "List" button on the passcode registration screen.
　　Able to manage registered passcodes on the screen.
　　・change passcode state(unused,used,invalid)
　　・delete passcode
　　・lock passcode(Only when unused)
　　　※Locked passcodes are excluded from the following operations.
　　　　・status change by list operation
　　　　・share passcodes
　(4)Transit to the communication screen by tapping the "Share" button on the passcode registration screen.
　　List of nearby devices by tapping "Search" button on the screen.
　(5)Transit to the passcodes sharing screen to by tapping the device you want to connect to from the list and
"Connect" button.
　　You can send the passcodes of the displayed lsit to the connection partner by tapping the "Send" button on the screen.

[About a glyph challenge function]
(1)Transit to MODS screen by tapping MODS.
(2)There is a new button "CHALLENGE" at the bottom left of the screen.

(5)The sequence list can be transitioned from the glyph learning function item on the setting screen or from the glyph challenge screen.
